DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation for the histology cytopathology involvement measured in percent.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs.  In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains._A branch of pathology that studies and diagnoses diseases on the cellular level including the anatomy, physiology, pathology and chemistry of the cell._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs.  In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains.:A branch of pathology that studies and diagnoses diseases on the cellular level including the anatomy, physiology, pathology and chemistry of the cell.

Concepts.definition: The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs.  In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains.
A branch of pathology that studies and diagnoses diseases on the cellular level including the anatomy, physiology, pathology and chemistry of the cell.

Property.preferredDefinition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for GU_ASSET Diagnosis form request on 10Apr. mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: values for the percentage for measurement of a trait of a specimen of tumor or other tissue._The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid._The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance._Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid.:Characteristics; distinguishing qualities of a person, object, or substance.:Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:Value; a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The smallest units of living structure capable of independent existence, composed of a membrane-enclosed mass of protoplasm and containing a nucleus or nucleoid.
The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.
A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
Value; a numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
